title: OK, so I don't think should be allowed
body:
So I was playing a game on a friends account (level 15) to get it to level 30 and I get into a lobby and then I realise their Yasuo has Thunderlord's/Nightbringer Yasuo/Border, I thought guess it's a one trick level 18, but he was actually level 30 after we won and he was Gold V, so Riot how does this work?? I don't want to run into this on the way to level 30 until levels 28-30 

https://imgur.com/a/26wKj
